title: Ryze skins bug
body: I‘ve found that ryze's Q skill has certain delay on some particular skins, hope can fixed it

replies.body: not a bug but can you give dark crystal Ryze back some red particles on his spells? They got removed in his mini rework and the different particles were why I (and probably others) actually bought the skin, for the shiny different particles!

Heya MixDx - 

As Danjeng had asked - which skin is causing the delay?
Which skins are they? My guess is pirate Ryze, because he has different animations.
